text:
sweet emblem of life's varied moments,
drooping rose with wilting charm,
your beauty fleeting and transient,
revealing life's ephemeral form.
thorns and sweetness intertwined,
symbolizing joy and pain combined,
your brief bloom speaks of beauty's might,
fading swiftly from morning's light.
reclining on compassion's breast,
your scattered petals find their rest,
a metaphor of human grace,
where sympathy finds its embrace.

i told her that her two teams weren't playing
she denied my statement, claiming i was lying,
her ex and a friend said the game was today
i repeatedly insisted there was no game in play,
she refused to believe me, causing me distress
eventually going to a friend's house, i must confess,
i watched alone while she spent time elsewhere
later she admitted no game was there, which seemed unfair.

the story begins in spanish guinea when a frenchman on vacation finds an injured toundi, who soon dies. the frenchman discovers toundi's diary, called an "exercise book". toundi leaves his abusive father and is taken in by father gilbert, a priest who teaches him to read, write, and about catholicism. after father gilbert dies in a motorcycle accident, toundi becomes a houseboy for the commandant and his wife. madame arrives from france and initially appears warm, but becomes hostile towards toundi. she has an affair with m. moreau, the ruthless prison director. toundi is accused of helping sophie steal salaries and is imprisoned and tortured. his friend mendim helps him escape punishment and takes him to the hospital, where doctors discover his broken ribs. toundi escapes the hospital in a dazed state, ultimately losing his faith in god by the end of the story.

i will set my bow in the sky as a sign of the covenant between myself and the earth.

from soft april showers that nourish and renew,
causing blossoms to emerge and colors to shine through,
the rainbow arches across the heavens bright,
displaying god's promise and merciful might.

its vibrant hues bear witness to divine decree,
that waters shall not flood, and nature shall be free
to cycle through seasons, with seed-time and harvest sure,
a testament of promise, steadfast and pure.

μedium onions, olive oil, garlic, ground lamb, whole tomatoes, thyme, cinnamon, allspice, nutmeg, cloves, butter, flour, milk, parmigiano-reggiano or kefalotyri cheese, egg yolks, ziti, and bread crumbs are combined to create a layered pasta dish. the recipe involves preparing a meat sauce, a bechamel sauce, and assembling the dish in layers before baking until golden and bubbling.

older individuals and women are increasingly purchasing home computer security software, with a notable rise in women buyers and retired users. the trend reflects changing demographics and growing awareness of online threats. experts suggest that security software should be user-friendly and accessible, with simple interfaces and clear instructions. the nature of online risks has evolved beyond email viruses, now including more sophisticated criminal activities targeting unprotected computers.

a recent fcc report indicates a significant surge in broadband internet adoption across the united states, with connections increasing by 38% to over 32 million in just one year. while the country ranks 13th globally in broadband penetration, president bush had previously pledged universal affordable high-speed internet access by 2007. cable connections predominate in the us, comprising 18.6 million lines, while phone line broadband accounts for 11.4 million connections, with users increasingly utilizing the technology for various online activities.

england prop phil vickery remains optimistic despite suffering a fractured radius in his right forearm during a match, which will keep him sidelined for at least six weeks. he plans to stay engaged with fitness work and team activities during his recovery, drawing encouragement from a conversation with another player who experienced a similar injury. gloucester's director of rugby expressed sympathy for vickery's setback, acknowledging the timing of the injury and its potential mental toll.

kevin spacey and kate bosworth attended the london premiere of "beyond the sea," a film about bobby darin that spacey wrote, directed, and starred in. spacey portrayed darin, singing all 18 soundtrack songs, while bosworth played sandra dee. the movie explores darin's life, including his musical success and early death, with sandra dee's approval. spacey considers the project a tribute to a remarkable talent and expressed great enjoyment in making the film.

dennis, narrated as a troubled individual, was exposed to pornographic material at 13. he recognizes henry from previous photographs. after his boyfriend julian leaves for france, dennis begins a relationship with julian's younger brother kevin, involving him in drugs and sexual activities. in 1989, dennis writes a letter to julian describing a sadistic killing spree in amsterdam. he meets two germans and together they commit random murders, including the torture and killing of an 11-year-old boy. julian and kevin travel to amsterdam to determine if the letter's contents are true or a fabrication.

if i gave 5 birds each 4 eyes, i would be blind for generations, silent for a day that grows into a week, spanning half my life, could i return home to my father? on sundays, a strange light appears on my bed, blinding me gradually until even candles surrender. i've come to this red shirt with seven dark buttons, like blood on my lips when hope became a bird's cry. this is the shirt adam gave death, moses' flag, my mother's lunch cloth. in this shirt, i meet the father of the sea, bearing a poem learned from mice, wearing buttons marking years, witnessing worlds, alone in a field of weeping rocks.

india and russia are planning collaborative energy initiatives, potentially involving significant investments in oil and gas projects. the agreement involves companies like gazprom and ongc exploring joint ventures in extraction, transportation, and refining across multiple regions. the partnership aims to address india's growing energy demands while leveraging russia's substantial gas resources. discussions include potential investments in sakhalin, eastern siberia, and the caspian sea, with investment estimates reaching up to $20 billion over five years.

a sunday evening unfolds with a passing l train, twilight and light illuminating a brown room. a boy sits at a table while his sister cuts his hair, the neon drugstore sign flickering. she encourages him about job prospects, arranging his suit and carfare, their shared moment tinged with hope and desperation as she trims his hair with cheap shears.

in this paper, we analyze the statistical classification accuracy of two markov field environments for pixelwise image segmentation, treating image labels as hidden states and solving their estimation via the map equation. the emission distribution remains constant across models, with differences arising from the markovian prior labeling hypothesis. the a priori labeling knowledge is modeled using a) a second order anisotropic markov mesh and b) a classical isotropic potts model. three segmentation procedures are considered: 2d path constrained viterbi training for the hidden markov mesh, graph cut based segmentation for the first order isotropic potts model, and icm for the second order isotropic potts model.

we provide a unified perspective on these methods and investigate classification performance by examining parameter estimation, computational efficiency, and automation level through statistical measures like overall accuracy, relative improvement, and kappa coefficient. this enables robust analysis of synthetic and real-life experimental data from dental diagnostic radiography. algorithms using learned parameters generate effective segmentations with minimal interaction when images have clear multimodal histograms. however, suboptimal learning becomes problematic with non-distinctive modes, constraining model complexity and achievable error rates.

matlab code is provided in a toolbox available for download from our website, adhering to the reproducible research paradigm.

this paper introduces an open-source presentation attack detection (pad) solution for distinguishing authentic iris images from irises with textured contact lenses. the software serves as a baseline for pad evaluations and a reference method for iris pad, written in c++ and python using open-source resources like opencv. without incorporating iris image segmentation, it approximately localizes the iris position. features are extracted using binary statistical image features (bsif) and classified by an ensemble of support vector machine, random forest, and multilayer perceptron classifiers. trained on the ndcld'15 database and evaluated on livdet-iris 2017 datasets, the software allows retraining classifiers with any authentic and attack image database. the current version achieves over 99% accuracy on ndcld'15 subject-disjoint subsets and around 85% on livdet-iris 2017 benchmarks, comparable to the competition winner's results.

bella swan moves from phoenix, arizona to forks, washington to live with her father, charlie, while her mother travels with her new husband. at her new school, bella attracts attention and is befriended by several students. seated next to edward cullen, he initially seems repulsed by her but later warms up after saving her from a van accident in the parking lot. bella becomes determined to understand how edward saved her. after learning local tribal legends from jacob black, she concludes edward's family are vampires who drink animal blood. edward admits he initially avoided her due to her blood's desirability. they fall in love, but their relationship is challenged when a nomadic vampire coven arrives. james, a tracker vampire, wants to hunt bella. the cullens try to protect her by sending her to phoenix, but james tricks her into meeting him. edward and his family rescue bella after james bites her, with edward sucking out the poison. they return to forks and attend the school prom, where bella expresses her desire to become a vampire, which edward refuses.

we propose an active learning approach to image segmentation that exploits geometric priors to speed up and streamline the annotation process. it can be applied for both background-foreground and multi-class segmentation tasks in 2d images and 3d image volumes. our approach combines geometric smoothness priors in the image space with uncertainty measures to estimate the most informative pixels or voxels for annotation. for multi-class settings, we introduce two novel uncertainty criteria. in the 3d case, we use the uncertainty measure to select voxels on a planar patch, making batch annotation more convenient. the planar patch is found using a branch-and-bound algorithm that identifies a 2d patch in a 3d volume with the most informative instances. we evaluate our approach on electron microscopy and magnetic resonance image volumes, as well as on images of horses and faces, demonstrating a substantial performance increase over other approaches due to geometric priors.

here's the rephrased version:

the article presents a novel approach to reduce coulomb interaction in organic solar cells, potentially increasing power conversion efficiencies. by incorporating electrically insulating, nanostructured high-k materials into the organic matrix, the permittivity of the active layer is enhanced, thereby diminishing coulomb interaction. an analytical model shows that coulomb interaction can be reduced by over 15% even at a 20 nm distance from the organic/inorganic interface. this concept was tested using p3ht:pcbm solar cells with integrated strontium titanate nanoparticles, demonstrating a power conversion efficiency improvement of approximately 20% compared to a reference cell without nanoparticles.

in 2210, julian "bean" delphiki and his three genetically enhanced children left earth on the starship herodotus. due to anton's key, they have high intelligence but uncontrollable growth. after 421 years of earth time, they discover a formic ark orbiting an uncharted planet. sergeant investigates the ship and encounters "rabs". they find dead workers and living male formics, who communicate with ender through mental images. the formics reveal the ship was sent before the original ender wiggin destroyed their species. they make a deal for the children to stay if they eliminate the rabs. bean communicates with the formics, learning about worker potential for rebellion. ender develops a virus to control their growth genome. bean, experiencing a moment of hope and joy, walks in sunlight for the first time in years before peacefully dying, content with his children's achievements.

set in 1918 during wwi, the story follows paul peachy, a shy railway employee and amateur actor from milwaukee. feeling unloved by his wife, he joins the u.s. army and goes to france. captured by germans in no man's land, he survives by impersonating a famous spy named harry stroller. as stroller, he experiences luxurious living and gains admiration from german officers. his deception becomes increasingly complex as he tries to avoid detection. during this time, he falls in love with annie, a french courtesan who appears to see through his disguise. the narrative concludes with unexpected plot twists.

michael owen expressed satisfaction with his time at real madrid, despite limited playing time. he remains open to a potential future return to the english premiership but is currently content in spain. owen defended his position at the club, stating he has played as many games as other team members and is happy with his start in madrid. while acknowledging his fond memories of liverpool, he is not actively considering an immediate move back to england.

a 20-year-old man from omaha, nebraska, is selling advertising space on his forehead on ebay. andrew fisher will have a non-permanent logo or brand name tattooed on his head for 30 days. he has received 39 bids, with the highest bid exceeding $322. the winner can choose a company name, domain name, or logo to be tattooed on his forehead. fisher is willing to accept most brands but will reject offensive or inappropriate content. he plans to use the money to fund his college education in graphic design. his mother was initially surprised but has since become supportive of his unique marketing approach.

nay, whether a pardoner, cheat, shrewd trickster, or timid beggar,
you'll meet misfortune and suffer like others who are burned,
all deceitful people who embrace falsehood will find
their ill-gotten gains quickly spent on taverns and women,
through revelry, games, and shameful pursuits,
wasting resources in reckless and fleeting pleasures,
better to work honestly in labor and husbandry,
than squander wealth on transient and base indulgences.

fluorescence microscopy images have multiple channels representing different marker stainings. deep learning segmentation models struggle with varied marker combinations because they require predefined channel configurations for training and inference. while recent approaches use modality attention to address this, there is no way to assess segmentation quality for marker combinations not present in the training data. our method estimates segmentation quality on unlabeled images by quantifying neural network uncertainties and using a random forest model to interpret these uncertainty features. we also show that incorporating uncertainty measures during training can enhance segmentation performance.

in the first section, clay calvert works on a sheep ranch owned by preston shivley, his stepfather's father. he unintentionally helps his stepfather, wade shivley, escape from jail and becomes a fugitive. he and a tunne indian boy flee into the wilderness, where clay joins a horse-trader with a young daughter, luce. in the second section, clay and luce marry and live in a sparsely populated coastal area. they meet settlers planning to move to eastern oregon. during the trip, they encounter wade shivley, who accuses clay of horse theft. wade is eventually hanged for a crime he did not commit, freeing clay. shortly after, luce falls ill, and when clay returns from seeking help, she is gone, seemingly with her father. in the final section, clay follows the wheat harvest and works on a scow on the columbia river. he returns to the eastern plains, meets the tunne indian boy again, and later finds him dead, suspecting luce's father as the killer. he joins the settlers until a harsh winter forces them to leave. on the return west, clay reunites with luce.

gordon brown has proposed key themes for labour's next election campaign, emphasizing full employment, lifelong education, health, and sustainable communities. he suggested ensuring every child's best start in life could be a significant legacy. while alan milburn will lead election strategy, brown will play a central role. tony blair praised brown's economic management and pledged childcare as a manifesto centerpiece, anticipating a challenging election. political commentators viewed brown's article as a strategic communication to maintain his influence in the party's election planning.

the key of solomon consists of two books, focusing solely on the necessary drawings for magical operations without describing any spirit's appearance or work. unlike later grimoires such as the pseudomonarchia daemonum or the lemegeton, it does not reference the spirits constrained by king solomon. following medieval grimoire tradition, all magical operations are performed through god's power, with invocations addressed to him. before conducting any "experiment," the operator must confess sins, purge evil, and seek divine protection. detailed preparations are required, including constructing items from specific materials obtained at precise astrological times, marked with magical symbols, and blessed with specific words. the text provides comprehensive details on substances for magic drawings and amulets, including their purification and preparation, with many symbols using the transitus fluvii occult alphabet.

lucky, a 10-year-old girl, lives in hard pan, a small california desert town, with her friends lincoln and miles. after her mother's death two years ago, her father asked brigitte, his first ex-wife, to come from france and care for lucky. fearing brigitte might abandon her, lucky runs away during a sandstorm with her dog, hms beagle. she finds miles lost and injured, and they seek shelter in dugouts near an abandoned mine. lincoln joins them and informs them the town is searching for them. lucky scatters her mother's ashes during a memorial service with the townspeople. brigitte later explains that the papers lucky found were for her legal adoption and reveals plans to open a restaurant in hard pan.

the novel begins at an alternate conclusion of the second punic war. hannibal proposes that romans abandon their city and move north of the alps or face destruction. the romans, led by q. fabius maximus, accept and withdraw to germania, vowing to return. carthaginians declare victory and depart.

generations later, the romans have reestablished their republic, adopting a more extensive cultural romanization by integrating germans into their society, including the legions and senate. prompted by omens, the senate sends a delegation to latium.

the expedition is led by marcus scipio, seeking to reestablish the republic in the mediterranean, and titus norbanus, a germanic roman aiming for personal glory and maintaining german power within the republic.

the romans recognize that constant warfare in germania has strengthened them, while carthaginians have grown weak. they manipulate political tensions between carthaginians and egyptians, reclaiming latium.

the novel concludes with scipio's egyptian army defeating the carthaginian force, with norbanus's four roman legions technically participating. the sequel will follow norbanus's return and political ascent.

life is a memoir recounting keith richards's journey from his childhood in dartford, kent, to his success with the rolling stones and current life in connecticut. his musical passion was inspired by his mother, doris, and grandfather augustus theodore dupree. in his teens, he reconnected with mick jagger, sharing a love for blues music. the rolling stones formed in 1962 with jagger, brian jones, bill wyman, ian stewart, and charlie watts, initially playing at ealing jazz club and crawdaddy club. the book details richards's career, including the band's rise, his personal struggles with drugs, arrests, and relationships with women like anita pallenberg and patti hansen. it explores the complex partnership with jagger and highlights richards's musical style and influences. the memoir also covers his side projects, such as the x-pensive winos, wingless angels, and collaborations with artists like chuck berry and gram parsons.

the remaining members of rock band queen are to go on tour next year with former free and bad company singer paul rodgers taking freddie mercury's place. guitarist brian may has said he expects to be on the road with rodgers and drummer roger taylor from april. queen have played with many different singers since mercury's death in 1991 but have reportedly not toured. may performed with rodgers at a concert to celebrate the 50th anniversary of the fender stratocaster guitar in london in september. they teamed up again for a concert to mark their induction into the uk music hall of fame, and were joined by taylor. queen went to number one in 2000 with a version of we will rock you sung by boy band 5ive and they have also played with robbie williams, will young and bob geldof. queen bassist john deacon has currently retired from the stage. rodgers was singer with early 1970s rockers free, who had a global hit with all right now, before forming bad company, a successful "supergroup" with members of king crimson and mott the hoople. he has also been in the firm with led zeppelin's jimmy page and the law with the small faces and the who drummer kenny jones.

the conservative party has decided to support the government's proposal for mandatory identification cards, despite internal disagreement. while backing the bill, they plan to scrutinize its implementation, cost-effectiveness, and potential privacy implications. the liberal democrats continue to oppose the scheme, calling it flawed and wasteful. concerns have been raised about potential discrimination and the impact on marginalized communities, particularly in the context of terrorism and immigration.

here's the rephrased version:

euronext, a pan-european stock market, has initiated preliminary discussions with the london stock exchange (lse) regarding a potential takeover. lse acknowledged the approach is in early stages and does not require an immediate response, while indicating ongoing talks with both euronext and deutsche boerse. previously, lse had rejected a £1.3bn takeover offer from deutsche boerse, asserting the proposal undervalued the business.

following the announcement, lse's shares rose 4.9% to 583p. market experts anticipate a potential bidding war for the exchange, which lists stocks with a £1.4 trillion total capitalization. commentators suggest a potential euronext merger might offer more cost savings compared to a deutsche boerse deal, given euronext's existing ownership of the liffe derivatives exchange.

media reports suggest euronext might submit a cash bid exceeding deutsche boerse's offer. although euronext's leadership has reportedly held private discussions, the company cannot currently guarantee a formal offer will be made. takeover speculation surrounding lse has persisted since a failed merger attempt with deutsche boerse in 2000.

this project, completed for a bsc physics with astrophysics degree, investigates the photometry of quasars using data from the sloan digital sky survey (sdss) and the uk infrared telescope (ukirt) infrared sky survey (ukidss). the research encompasses 5730 matched quasars, analyzing their uv/optical/near-ir characteristics. the sample spans redshifts between 0.01 and 3, and absolute magnitudes from -29.3 to -13.8, with 17 percent of sdss quasars successfully matched to ukidss data. combining sdss ugriz with ukidss jhk near-ir photometry offers significant potential for understanding quasar populations, noting that these surveys are ongoing.

ruby's school life begins poorly when mrs. ironwood, influenced by daphne, warns her about her background. despite this, ruby befriends louis turnbull, miss stevens, and abby. giselle becomes jealous and exposes abby's racial background, forcing her to withdraw. after pierre's death, mrs. ironwood falsely accuses ruby of sexual misconduct, but louis and miss stevens help her. during christmas, ruby discovers giselle can walk and threatens to expose her. miss stevens resigns after a false seduction accusation. ruby becomes pregnant by beau, who is sent to france. daphne arranges an abortion, but ruby refuses and returns to houma. she contacts paul, who offers her a home. her grandfather jack dies in the swamps. ruby gives birth to pearl during a devastating hurricane, feeling hopeful about her future.

alan duncan, a newly qualified english lawyer, returns to his parents' successful sheep ranch in australia after studying at oxford as a rhodes scholar and serving as a pilot in world war ii, during which he was injured and lost both feet. his homecoming is overshadowed by the apparent suicide of his parents' housekeeper, jessie proctor. discovering her hidden personal papers, alan learns she is actually janet prentice, his deceased brother bill's former girlfriend and a royal navy wren. janet experienced significant losses during the war, including bill, her father, her dog, and later her mother. she harbors guilt over a wartime incident involving potential allied casualties in a german aircraft. her diaries reveal her journey to australia was motivated by both alan and her need to seek atonement for past events. through janet's story, alan gains insights into confronting his own future.

texas has initiated a civil lawsuit against two alleged top spammers, ryan samuel pitylak and mark stephen trotter, seeking substantial damages. the attorney general claims their companies violated multiple email marketing laws, including the can-spam act, by sending millions of unwanted messages with misleading subject lines and unauthorized services. the defendants deny wrongdoing and assert their compliance with federal regulations. simultaneously, the federal trade commission obtained a court order halting an international spam operation sending sexually explicit emails that violated similar legal standards.

for ten years, jamayah, a mystic from argentina, has taught rickshaw lubowski wisdom teachings about paranormal command and cosmic awareness. after three initiations, rickshaw abandons the path of return for sex, drugs, occultism, and sorcery. he becomes the target of a curse from an evil cult leader, generating collateral karma that brings nightmares and the potential death of his fiancé. unable to reconnect with his teachings, rickshaw meets a blind fortuneteller and falls in love. jamayah appears, and together with two native american shamans, they confront the cult leader. jamayah requires rickshaw to complete a fourth initiation, which rickshaw learns his mentor's son and another have already completed. the initiation, called cascading boulders in trance, involves completely trusting the universe at the risk of physical death.

humans can comprehend and interact with nature only to the extent that they have observed and understood its processes. the understanding is limited without proper tools and methods, and human knowledge is directly tied to the ability to produce effects by understanding causes. scientific study requires careful observation, experimentation, and rejection of preconceived notions or "idols" that distort perception. true scientific progress demands a systematic, inductive approach that rises from specific observations to general principles, rather than starting with broad generalizations. the human mind is prone to various cognitive biases that impede accurate understanding of nature, including tendency to seek patterns, overvalue familiar ideas, and be swayed by language and philosophical traditions.

we analyze nesting statistics in the $o(n)$ loop model on random maps, extending previous work on disk and cylinder topologies to arbitrary topologies. we use topological recursion results for map enumeration in the $o(n)$ model. we define generating series for maps of genus $g$ with $k'$ marked points, $k$ boundaries, and a specific nesting graph. these series allow explicit computations in the loop model with bending energy on triangulations, and we characterize their critical behavior in dense and dilute phases.

deep convolutional neural networks (dcnn) based image segmentation methods struggle with generalizability, often requiring manually traced training images for new imaging modalities or disease cohorts. to address this, an end-to-end synthetic segmentation network (synseg-net) is proposed, which can train a segmentation network for a target imaging modality without manual labels. using unpaired intensity images from source and target modalities, and manual labels from the source modality, synseg-net leverages recent advances in cycle generative adversarial networks (cyclegan) and dcnn. evaluated on mri to ct splenomegaly and ct to mri total intracranial volume synthetic segmentation, the approach outperformed two-stage methods and achieved comparable performance to traditional segmentation networks in certain scenarios. the source code is publicly available on github.

liverpool's manager rafael benitez was content with the 3-1 victory against bayer leverkusen, despite conceding a late goal. benitez stated that he would have accepted the scoreline before the match and emphasized the importance of maintaining focus until the final whistle.

he expressed confidence in the team's ability to complete the task in germany and defended goalkeeper jerzy dudek, whose mistake led to the last-minute goal. benitez argued that had liverpool converted more chances, the late goal would have been insignificant.

the manager looked forward to the return of captain steven gerrard, who was suspended for the first leg. benitez praised gerrard's importance to the team, noting his ability to elevate the performance of his teammates and draw opposition attention. however, he stressed the need for a collective team effort rather than relying on individual brilliance.

the paper introduces a unified optimization approach for video/image segmentation and localization, integrating low-level appearance and high-level localization cues with weak supervision. the framework uses two representations, applies spatial constraints between bounding boxes and superpixels, and discriminates foreground and background at both levels. unlike previous discriminative clustering methods, it includes a foreground model that minimizes histogram differences across image frames. by leveraging geometric relationships between superpixels and bounding boxes, the method improves segmentation and localization iteratively. the approach is validated on youtube object, internet object discovery, and pascal voc 2007 datasets.

whatever beauty attracts and causes movement, winding and shifting, though it does not impede my search, since higher things do not concern lesser ones; nevertheless, seeing all things derive from divinity and teach duty, i will learn from this subject. the respected subject is well-disposed, as corrupted or dead bodies cannot engage with it. there is a pure, restless desire for its vital fire, an unquenchable longing. these are the magnets that work upon light and love, guiding like beautiful shapes. where celestial desire takes root and grows, god establishes commerce and reveals secrets. this is the heart he desires; those who willingly give it will experience god's truth, like unseen herbs renewing their youth.

john and philippa gaunt, djinn twins, embark on a global journey in the fourth installment of the children of the lamp series. they race against time to prevent their mother layla from becoming the blue djinn of babylon, free their father edward from an aging curse, and protect museums from unexplained robberies and hauntings. during their mission, they discover an evil force has awakened the terracotta warriors, possessing them with wicked spirits. the twins must now solve the mysterious robberies, halt the terracotta warriors, rescue their parents, and save the world from impending doom.

after the divorce of beale and ida farange, their young daughter maisie is required to spend six months with each parent. the parents, immoral and frivolous, use maisie to fuel their mutual hatred. beale marries maisie's governess, miss overmore, while ida marries sir claude. maisie's new governess is mrs. wix. both parents pursue lovers outside their marriages, and sir claude and mrs. beale begin an affair. maisie is largely abandoned by her parents and becomes sir claude's responsibility. eventually, maisie must choose between sir claude, mrs. beale, and mrs. wix. in france, she realizes her new parents' relationship will likely end like her biological parents' and chooses to stay with mrs. wix, her most reliable guardian.

at least three scottish residents perished in the tsunami, with three more unaccounted for, according to the first minister's parliamentary announcement. the statement detailed scotland's sympathy for the disaster victims, commitment to reconstruction efforts, and generous financial and humanitarian response. the first minister emphasized scotland's long-term dedication to helping affected communities and supporting global poverty reduction initiatives, highlighting the country's involvement in aid efforts and the upcoming make poverty history campaign.

we present a method to precisely measure the efficiency of a single-photon detector with an accuracy better than 1%. the setup uses standard optical components and does not depend on calibrated devices, making it reproducible in any laboratory. the approach employs an erbium-doped-fiber-amplifier radiometer as a primary optical power measurement standard and an ultra-stable spontaneous emission source. as a demonstration, we determined the efficiency of an ingaas/inp single-photon detector. we confirmed the measurement's accuracy through independent verification, including comparing the edfa radiometer's optical power measurement with a transfer power meter from the swiss federal office of metrology. this method is suitable for regularly characterizing high-efficiency single-photon detectors.

we adapt first-order model agnostic meta-learning algorithms to image segmentation, introduce efficientlab, a neural network architecture designed for rapid learning, and use a formal test error definition to reduce error on out-of-distribution tasks. our approach achieves state-of-the-art results on the fss-1000 dataset by meta-training efficientlab with fomaml and optimizing test-time adaptation hyperparameters using bayesian optimization. we also develop the fp-k dataset to study meta-learning performance in few- and many-shot scenarios, demonstrating that meta-learned initializations benefit few-shot image segmentation but are overtaken by conventional transfer learning with more than 10 labeled examples.

cherie blair reportedly criticized george w. bush's policies during a lecture tour in the united states, praising the supreme court's decisions on guantanamo bay detainees and legal matters. she reportedly spoke to law students in massachusetts, commenting on human rights and legal issues, which drew criticism from conservatives who viewed her remarks as inappropriate for a political figure speaking abroad.

us food and drug regulators are set to evaluate the potential sale of painkillers associated with heightened risks of heart attack and stroke. the fda advisory panel will review evidence regarding cox-2 inhibitors like celebrex and vioxx, considering whether the potential benefits outweigh the increased health risks. merck has indicated interest in reintroducing vioxx pending fda approval, while other pharmaceutical companies continue to market similar drugs. european regulators have already issued warnings about the cardiovascular dangers of these medications for certain patient groups.

1 pint whipping cream (unwhipped)
1 lb maple sugar, grated
2 cups all-purpose flour
2 teaspoons baking powder
1/4 cup butter, room temp
2/3 cup sour cream
1 beaten egg
prepare sour cream dough by cutting butter into flour and baking powder, then adding egg and sour cream. divide dough into two balls. roll out thin to cover a 9x13 inch glass pan. create layers by alternating dough strips, maple sugar, and cream. prick dough with fork. seal edges carefully to keep cream contained. bake at 400°f for 35 minutes. cool and slice into squares. serves 12.

when justice fails due to errors by law enforcement, remain resolute and undeterred. continue pursuing justice through established methods. present your convictions clearly to those who doubt, revealing the depth of your determination. even when judges lose sight of true justice, maintain hope and continue breathing. there are still those who silently remain committed to truth, keeping their integrity intact. seek out those who value truth, beauty, and goodness over material gain. stand together on the side of what is right, searching for ideals amidst darkness, and persistently pursue justice.

in absolute oblivion
amid nature's forces
transcending historical narratives
seeking liberation from human constraints
beyond societal expectations
breaking philosophical chains
escaping predetermined paths
pursuing ultimate autonomy
rejecting external controls
embracing individual truth
discovering personal sovereignty
liberating from collective illusions
entering a state of pure self-awareness
declaring unconditional freedom
celebrating personal emancipation

the comedy sideways swept the independent spirit awards, winning six nominations including best film, with alexander payne claiming best director and screenplay. paul giamatti, thomas haden church, and virginia madsen received acting awards. other notable winners included catalina sandino moreno for maria full of grace, zach braff for garden state, and the sea inside as best foreign film. the awards, voted by independent feature project/los angeles members, are traditionally held the day before the oscars and recognize films outside the mainstream studio system.

directional infrared emission at 1367 and 5230 nm emerges in rb vapours through step-wise excitation by low-power resonant light. the mid-infrared radiation from amplified spontaneous emission on the 5d-6p transition includes forward and backward components with unique spectral and spatial characteristics. diffraction-limited near-infrared light at 1367 nm, generated only in the co-propagating direction, results from parametric wave mixing around the 5p-5d-6p-6s-5p transition loop. this highly non-degenerate mixing process involves one externally applied and two internally generated optical fields. similarities between wave mixing generated blue and near-ir light are shown.

the book is divided into two sections: the first part narrates hitler's early years from 1907 to 1918, covering his life as a struggling artist in vienna and his service in world war i. after the war, hitler encounters the thule society in munich and becomes involved with the german workers party (dap). the narrative concludes in 1920 when hitler transforms the dap into the nazi party (nsdap). in an interview, author claus hant explains that while post-1920 events are well-documented, his focus is on hitler's transformation from an insignificant artist to a political leader. hant argues that recent research reveals new insights into this crucial period. the second part of the book consists of non-fiction appendices providing detailed, lesser-known facts about hitler, which support hant's thesis and offer a new perspective on hitler's rise to power.

the narrative focuses on longstreet's spy harrison gathering intelligence about federal movements, presenting the battle primarily through the perspectives of confederate commanders robert e. lee and james longstreet, and union commanders joshua lawrence chamberlain and john buford. chapters explore the emotional decision-making of these officers during battle, with maps illustrating troop positioning and movements. the book uses the gettysburg battle to explore civil war causes and motivations that led former friends to fight each other. while comparable to the red badge of courage, the novel concentrates more on generals' and colonels' actions than common soldiers. inspired by shakespeare's henry v and a family vacation to gettysburg in 1966, the author created this work. his son jeffrey shaara later expanded the story with a prequel and sequel.

andy roddick is potentially set to hire us davis cup assistant dean goldfine as his new tennis coach following the end of his partnership with brad gilbert. goldfine has confirmed preliminary discussions have occurred, indicating they share similar expectations and that roddick is carefully evaluating the potential long-term coaching relationship.

consuelo (connie) ramos, a 37-year-old hispanic woman recently released from a mental institution, communicates with luciente, an androgynous figure from a potential future utopian world. this future society in mattapoisett has eliminated many social issues like pollution, racism, and consumerism. despite being institutionalized again after confronting her niece's pimp, connie learns she plays a crucial role in determining historical outcomes. she discovers two potential futures: one utopian and another dystopian where an elite class controls the population through drugs and surgical mood manipulation. uncertain whether her visions are real or symptomatic of mental illness, connie ultimately takes a violent action to prevent the dystopian future's mind-control technology. though her success is not guaranteed, she views her resistance as a personal victory, declaring she fought against her oppressors.

the novel explores the relationship between irishwoman adelia "dee" cunnane and american travis grant. dee moves to the united states to live with her uncle paddy on a horse farm. she works alongside him and develops a contentious relationship with travis, the farm's wealthy owner. their frequent arguments often lead to passionate encounters. after travis saves dee from an attempted rape, paddy, concerned about his health and dee's future, urges travis to care for her. they enter a marriage of convenience, initially reluctant to acknowledge their true feelings. their relationship becomes more stable after consummating the marriage. margot, travis's ex-girlfriend, attempts to exploit dee's insecurities, causing dee to flee. travis pursues her, and they ultimately confess their love and commit to their marriage.

elderly and disabled individuals would gain control over their personal care budgets, with the government proposing a system where they can decide how their care is organized and spent. the plan includes establishing a senior adult services coordinator in each english area to improve inter-agency collaboration. while aiming to empower individuals and reduce dependency, the government maintains its stance against providing free long-term care, suggesting the current system could be adapted to offer more personal choice and flexibility in care services.

the book challenges the official u.s. government narrative of 9/11, suggesting that the events were an internal plot orchestrated by a group within the administration. it argues that the afghanistan war was pre-planned, bush leveraged evangelical support for an anti-islamic campaign, and the "war on terror" was used to restrict civil liberties. the book claims osama bin laden was a cia asset, the bin laden and bush families have financial ties through the carlyle group, and industrial groups influenced the government's actions. it also alleges cia involvement in widespread interference, including torture and political assassinations.

arsene wenger has escalated his conflict with sir alex ferguson by accusing him of bringing football into disrepute, responding to ferguson's earlier claim that wenger was "a disgrace". the dispute stems from a previous match involving controversial incidents, with both managers exchanging criticism about player behavior and the game's conduct.

training robots in the physical world is often time-consuming and risky, leading to increased use of simulators for learning. however, differences between synthetic and real visual data hinder direct model transfer. this paper introduces a modular architecture addressing the virtual-to-real challenge by separating the learning model into perception and control policy modules, using semantic image segmentation as a bridging representation. the perception module converts rgb images to semantic segmentation, while the control policy module, implemented as a deep reinforcement learning agent, acts based on the translated segmentation. evaluated in obstacle avoidance and target following tasks, the architecture outperforms baseline methods in both virtual and real environments, showing a faster learning curve. a comprehensive analysis of variant configurations is also provided, confirming the architecture's transferability.

there is a powerful, inspiring force that permeates nature, like dew or perfume, becoming the essence of existence. as the poet reflects on renewed desires and memories, this force stirs deep emotions, transcending personal perception and connecting with something absolute and divine. the spirit of beauty calls to the poet, guiding him through various landscapes and experiences, inspiring a lifelong dedication to seeking beauty and wonder. despite life's challenges, the poet remains committed to this spiritual journey, finding solace and meaning in the ever-present, transformative power of beauty that touches all aspects of existence.

the novel follows friedrich löwenberg, a jewish viennese intellectual, and kingscourt, an americanized prussian aristocrat, who retreat to a pacific island in the cook islands. after twenty years of isolation, they return through palestine and find a transformed land with a modern, free, and technologically advanced jewish society. the narrative structure resembles edward bellamy's "looking backward," using the device of a character experiencing a utopian future.

in a night of intense vulnerability, the narrator battles inner turmoil, repeatedly rising to switch on lights while feeling physically weak. motivated by thoughts of his daughter, he struggles through a solitary evening marked by silence and crickets. as dawn approaches, he finally achieves a sense of peace and falls asleep. afterward, life returns to its usual state of activity and communication.

the challenge of finding the minimum number of "flooding operations" to make a given colored graph monochromatic in the flood-it game has been researched algorithmically, but key questions about the maximum possible moves in the worst scenario remain unresolved. we start a comprehensive examination of these questions, aiming to determine the maximum number of moves potentially needed across all possible graph colorings. we provide various upper and lower bounds for general graphs and demonstrate that these bounds are precise for trees, while also exploring potential improvements to the upper bounds for graphs with increased edge-density.

captured in the psalms are the most eloquent praises
and to read and ponder them affords one great graces.
the lord's is the earth, and the sea, and the sky;
his is the moon, stars, sun and clouds rolling by.
his seasons glorify him each in their own way.
think of the hope in the beauty of a spring day,
thunderclaps and lightning of summer at play,
fall's russets, browns, and yellows in breezes sway,
and winter's cold, chill, and ice, with snows that lay.
ponder the land with rocks, hills and mountains,
rivers, streams, and geysers spewing like fountains.
consider the lilies, roses, shrubs and trees
which cause one to thank god on bended knees.
think about the creatures on the land and in the sea
and praise god for everyone that has come to be.
praise the lord morning, noon and night
sing out his praises with all of our might.
keep a book of prayers within easy reach;
devour everything it is meant to teach.
~ let's remember ~
captured in the psalms are the most eloquent praises;
to read and ponder them affords one great graces,
for the word of god throughout all ages
is contained in our bibles' well-worn pages.

we simulate impulsively generated linear and non-linear alfv\'en waves in weakly curved coronal magnetic flux-tubes and explore their role in coronal heating and solar wind acceleration. using numerical solutions of time-dependent magnetohydrodynamic equations, we analyze wave characteristics in an expanding open magnetic field configuration with a realistic temperature distribution. we calculate the maximum transversal velocity of linear and non-linear alfv\'en waves at various coronal funnel heights and examine their propagation behavior. the results suggest that pulse-driven non-linear alfv\'en waves can potentially provide sufficient energy to heat coronal funnels and drive solar wind, while linear alfv\'en waves primarily influence plasma dynamics in polar coronal hole flux-tubes.

current semantic segmentation techniques primarily focus on single image segmentation, leading to video sequences being processed frame by frame. this approach neglects temporal image information, which could enhance segmentation performance. recurrent neural networks offer a potential solution for incorporating temporal information, though few approaches currently utilize them for video segmentation. existing methods typically modify encoder-decoder architectures by inserting convolutional lstm layers between encoder and decoder. however, this positioning may not be optimal. modern segmentation approaches increasingly use multi-branch architectures, making recurrent unit placement more challenging. this work explores integrating convolutional lstm layers at various positions within multi-branch architectures across two datasets, demonstrating performance improvements of up to 1.6 percent over traditional cnn-based approaches.

a child was born, and the son was given, bringing rebirth and forgiveness through his blood. sacrificed on a cross, he ended the law and ushered in the age of grace, offering redemption to all. the sinless one came as light into a world of darkness, placing his light within believers. coming as god willed, christ became the savior, fulfilling a divine purpose through his sacrifice, enabling new birth and eternal life for humanity.

recent work on robust principal components analysis (pca) involves recovering a low-rank matrix $\mathbf{l}$ and a sparse matrix $\mathbf{s}$ from their sum $\mathbf{m}:= \mathbf{l} + \mathbf{s}$, with a provably exact convex optimization solution called pcp. this study explores using partial knowledge of the column space of $\mathbf{l}$ to improve the pcp solution and potentially recover under weaker assumptions. a modification called modified-pcp is proposed, which leverages this subspace knowledge. when the available subspace information is accurate, modified-pcp requires significantly weaker incoherence assumptions compared to pcp. simulations and comparisons with pcp and other methods are presented, including a stylized real application. the problem is also shown to naturally occur in time series data through the online or recursive robust pca problem, with a corresponding corollary provided.

red kidney beans are soaked and cooked with a bay leaf and onion. sliced onions are caramelized, then garlic is added. beans are simmered with their broth, then spinach, herbs, and scallions are stirred in. optional dried limes are added for flavor. the dish is finished with fresh lemon juice and served hot.

the narrative unfolds through the perspective of a young boy on a frozen earth, detached from the sun by a "dark star". the solar heating loss has caused the atmosphere to freeze into thick snow layers. the boy's father, a scientist, previously attempted to build a large shelter with colleagues, but earthquakes destroyed it and killed the other scientists. he subsequently constructed a smaller shelter called the "nest", where the family survives by collecting and thawing frozen oxygen pails over a fire. eventually, a search party from los alamos survivors finds them, revealing that other human groups have survived at various nuclear research facilities and are planning uranium mining colonies. the narrator's age is disclosed only in the final sentence.

a very long engagement garnered 12 césar nominations despite previously being deemed "not french enough" by a paris court. the world war i romantic drama, backed partially by warner bros., was initially challenged by french producers but ultimately allowed to compete. the film, directed by jean-pierre jeunet and starring audrey tautou, received nominations for best actress, picture, and director. other nominated films include police drama 36, kings and queen, and the chorus, with actors like daniel auteuil and gerard jugnot also receiving nods. the césar awards ceremony is scheduled for 26 february, with will smith set to receive an honorary award.

the ott-antonsen ansatz has been a key method for understanding large coupled phase oscillator systems. when coupling is sinusoidal and phase dynamics are uniform across oscillators, the system's macroscopic behavior can be described by low-dimensional dynamics. the research investigates whether this manifold remains attractive when introducing oscillator-specific parameters that link an oscillator's phase to its dynamics. the study extends the ott-antonsen ansatz, demonstrating that parameter-dependent oscillatory systems converge to the ott-antonsen manifold under specific conditions. the mathematical proof supports previous numerical observations and provides a robust framework for analyzing theta neuron networks. the research further generalizes the approach by accommodating time-dependent and multi-dimensional parameters and diverse network coupling topologies, thus broadening the ansatz's applicability to more realistic scenarios.

in this narrative poem, a young man falls in love with jenny, a woman with a colorful past involving multiple lovers from the cavalry. they marry, and she becomes a faithful wife and mother. years later, during a christmas ball of cavalry soldiers, jenny is drawn to the music and dancing, joining the celebration and dancing vigorously. after an intense night of dancing, she returns home and dies, with her husband unaware of her final adventure. the poem reflects on the changing times and the free spirit of the past.

deep learning techniques have achieved remarkable results in medical image semantic segmentation. however, these approaches often lack uncertainty quantification, potentially causing downstream analysis errors. by employing bayesian neural networks, we address uncertainty in semantic segmentation. our method transforms voxel-wise uncertainty into volumetric uncertainty and calibrates measurement confidence intervals. in a tumor volume estimation scenario, we demonstrate how uncertainty modeling enables deep learning systems to provide volume estimates with reliable error margins, enhancing clinical safety. our findings show that uncertainty estimates generalize to new data and remain robust under artificial noise, potentially facilitating deeper integration of deep learning tools in clinical settings.

the narrative presents an autobiographical exploration of abdul alhazred's life, the reputed author of the necronomicon. unique in its approach, the book depicts alhazred as a complex antihero, beginning with a graphic account of his torturous past under a cruel king. these early experiences shape his violent adult persona, leading him to commit horrific acts like cannibalism and child murder, and aligning with a ghoul cult. alhazred survives through his unusual abilities, including emotional detachment, remarkable agility, and communication with the dead. he acquires bizarre survival tools such as an obsidian blade and mystical spiders that enhance his sensory capabilities. throughout his journey, he interacts with various entities from the cthulhu mythos.

bambi, a roe deer fawn, is born in a thicket during late spring. his mother educates him about forest life throughout the summer. she introduces him to the meadow, which is both beautiful and dangerous. bambi meets his aunt ena and her twin fawns, faline and gobo, and they become friends. they encounter male deer, learning that fathers rarely interact with females and young.

as bambi grows, he has his first frightening encounter with humans. a stag named the old prince teaches him independence. during winter, hunters kill many animals, including bambi's mother and presumably gobo.

a year later, bambi develops and reunites with faline. he defeats other male deer and they express their love. the old prince saves bambi from a hunter's trap, teaching him caution.

gobo returns, raised by humans, but is later killed when he naively approaches a hunter. bambi becomes more solitary, occasionally meeting the old prince, who teaches him survival skills.

after being shot, bambi recovers with the prince's help. when bambi is old, the prince shows him that humans are not all-powerful by revealing a dead hunter.

at the novel's end, bambi encounters twin fawns, scolding them for dependence, and reflects on their resemblance to past connections.

here's a rephrasing of the text:

let $k$ be a field with characteristic zero. consider a smooth, projective, geometrically rational $k$-surface $x$. a universal torsor $\mathcal{t}$ over $x$ with a $k$-point and its smooth compactification $\mathcal{t}^c$ raise the question of whether $\mathcal{t}^c$ is $k$-birationally equivalent to a projective space. the unramified cohomology groups of degree 1 and 2 for $\mathcal{t}$ and $\mathcal{t}^c$ are reduced to their constant part. for the third cohomology groups, a sufficient condition is provided using the galois structure of $x$'s geometrical picard group. this approach shows that $h^{3}_{nr}(\mathcal{t}^{c},\mathbb{q}/\mathbb{z}(2))/h^3(k,\mathbb{q}/\mathbb{z}(2))$ vanishes for a generalised ch\^atelet surface and is reduced to its $2$-primary part for a del pezzo surface of degree at least 2.

we present a framework in coq for constructing verified proofs of distributed self-stabilizing algorithms. first, we define the locally shared memory model with composite atomicity in coq, which is the standard model in self-stabilizing systems. we demonstrate our framework's effectiveness by certifying a significant part of an existing silent self-stabilizing algorithm that creates a $k$-clustering of the network. additionally, we verify a quantitative property of the algorithm's output, specifically proving that the computed $k$-clustering contains at most $\lfloor \frac{n-1}{k+1} \rfloor + 1$ clusterheads, where $n$ represents the network's node count. to achieve these results, we developed a library with tools for potential functions and set cardinality.

four months after naked in death, eve finds prosecuting attorney cicely towers' body on may 2. commander whitney, a close friend of towers, assigns eve as primary investigator. c. j. morse, a reporter, contacts eve about the case. eve stays at roarke's home, where their relationship shows tension. roarke sells his illegal businesses and gives eve a diamond. a second victim, actress yvonne metcalf, is found murdered. dr. mira suggests the killer targets famous women with connections to roarke. eve decides to use herself as bait. louise kirski is murdered, with evidence pointing to david angelini. david is arrested but later released. eve discovers c. j. morse's involvement and finds he is holding nadine hostage. during a confrontation in central park, roarke saves eve by intervening in her fight with morse, resulting in morse's death. roarke proposes to eve afterward.

in this study, the electrical transport properties of 25 nm thick nb films deposited on photosensitive biocl were examined between 7.5 k and 8.5 k. green (532 nm) and red (640 nm) laser excitations' effects on the resistive superconducting transitions of nb thin films on silicon glass and biocl single crystal substrates were analyzed. the nb resistivity's temperature dependence aligns with the mcmillan model, suggesting a strong inverse proximity effect at the interface. laser excitation enhances the biocl/nb interface's influence, increasing the ratio of normal to superconducting carriers near absolute zero, which correlates with biocl single crystal photoconductivity findings.

due to the high labor and expertise costs of annotating 3d medical images at a voxel level, most benchmark datasets have annotations for only one type of organs and/or tumors, leading to partially labeling. to address this, we propose a dynamic on-demand network (dodnet) that learns to segment multiple organs and tumors on partially labeled datasets. dodnet includes a shared encoder-decoder architecture, a task encoding module, a controller for generating dynamic convolution filters, and a single dynamic segmentation head. the current segmentation task's information is encoded as a task-aware prior to indicate the expected problem. unlike existing approaches with fixed kernels, dodnet's kernels are adaptively generated by the controller, based on the input image and assigned task. this enables dodnet to segment multiple organs and tumors efficiently and flexibly. we created a large-scale partially labeled dataset called mots and demonstrated dodnet's superior performance on seven organ and tumor segmentation tasks. we also transferred mots pre-trained weights to a downstream multi-organ segmentation task, achieving state-of-the-art performance. this study presents a general 3d medical image segmentation model pre-trained on a large-scale partially labelled dataset, which can be extended to downstream volumetric medical data segmentation tasks. the dataset and code are available at: https://git.io/dodnet

born in 1850 to a spanish mother and a scotsman in new mexico, santa fe (fey) cameron is orphaned young and raised by neighbors. as a teenager, she leaves town with terry dillon, a traveling salesman. they marry at raton pass and travel east, selling medicine and earning money. in new york city, they quickly spend their savings, and terry abandons fey when she becomes pregnant. she gives birth to lucita and later marries simeon tower after securing a divorce. they build wealth and social status until 1877, when simeon faces financial ruin and terry reappears, causing disruption. ultimately, they return to new mexico, where they live out their remaining days.

as long as his hopes persist,
he might just manage to exist,
treading a path fraught with risk,
while she cries out, calling him brisk.

her tears speak of emotions deep,
he knows his flight is not dove-like and steep,
recognizing the precarious rope he treads,
a teenage girl stands where danger spreads.

his gaze fixed on her pink attire,
a lover whose vision does not tire,
tracing her form from feet to face,
embracing her delicate, silken grace.

midway, his eyes find momentary rest,
this spot allows him to catch his breath, feeling blessed,
her shy glance meets his intense stare,
her skyward prayers, a lover's silent prayer.

a wild, undisciplined boy so bold,
can disparate metals together hold?
perhaps love's magic can transform all,
turning wrong to right, standing tall.

close to her heart, a valley of desire,
heartbeats climbing ever higher,
watching her dance, hips swaying free,
hands entwined, lips meeting in harmony.

a wordless contract of passion's need,
where love becomes the ultimate creed.

uncertainty quantification in medical image segmentation is crucial for critical decision-making. while previous approaches typically used gaussian densities, this work introduces normalizing flows to enable more complex density modeling. by augmenting the probabilistic u-net's posterior density with normalizing flows, the method achieves improved uncertainty quantification and predictive performance on lidc-idri and kvasir-seg datasets. the results demonstrate that more flexible density models can enhance segmentation ambiguity capture, potentially increasing human confidence in annotation and technology adoption.

i am trayvon martin
in multiple languages, echoing the universal cry
of injustice, pain, and systemic oppression
where skin color determines fate
where victims are blamed
where justice seems distant and elusive
a scream against discrimination
a testament to the ongoing struggle
for equality and human dignity
where being born is a risk
where survival depends on circumstance
and prejudice reigns supreme

here's the rephrased text, maintaining the original content without adding anything extra:

on june 30, 2008, boxer santaros awakens alone in the nevada desert, injects himself with a red syringe, and begins walking. fortunio balducci is on a houseboat with tab taverner, ronald taverner, jimmy hermosa, and krysta now. fortunio loses an online poker game with soldiers in syria and owes bookies $100,000. tab suggests leaving nevada before the holiday weekend.

krysta offers to help fortunio get a visa at buffalo bill's bar. while driving, fortunio finds boxer unconscious on the road. boxer suffers from amnesia and speaks cryptically. a nevada park ranger discovers an abandoned suv with a burned corpse, which is later stolen by armed men.

at buffalo bill's, krysta performs and creates a game to help fortunio and boxer. she convinces boxer they were working on a script called 'the power' together. boxer receives a mysterious phone call warning him to stay with krysta and take injections.

the narrative continues to unfold, revealing interconnected storylines involving the taverner twins, boxer, krysta, and various characters connected to a mysterious experiment involving fluid karma, time distortions, and a potential apocalyptic event.

the story spans from june 27 to july 3, 2008, exploring themes of memory, conspiracy, and potential global transformation.

we explore log-supermodular probabilistic models with binary variables, characterized by submodular negative log-densities. these models offer probabilistic interpretations for combinatorial optimization problems like image segmentation. our research centers on parameter estimation using known upper-bounds for the intractable log-partition function. we demonstrate that the separable optimization bound on the base polytope is less effective than the "perturb-and-map" approach. to learn parameters, we employ a stochastic subgradient method to maximize a log-likelihood lower-bound, based on an expectation from our randomization. this approach can be extended to conditional maximum likelihood. we validate our findings through experiments in binary image denoising, showcasing the model's adaptability in handling missing data.

julian, dick, and anne visit george in cornwall for the holidays. they plan to explore kirrin island, but their plans are disrupted when aunt fanny falls ill and leaves with uncle quentin for medical treatment. mrs. stick, a temporary cook, arrives with her husband and son edgar. the children and the sticks develop mutual animosity. when mrs. stick attempts to poison george's dog timmy, george plans to run away to kirrin island. julian discovers her plan, and they all go together. on the island, they find evidence of smugglers and hear a scream at night. they discover the sticks have kidnapped a rich man's daughter and are holding her captive. the children confront the sticks and rescue the girl, taking her to the police, who are shocked to find the child everyone has been searching for. the police return to the island and arrest the sticks. the kidnapped girl's father allows her to spend a week with her new friends on kirrin island.

a new method for uncertainty quantification in dense conditional random fields (crfs) is introduced. the perturb-and-mpm approach allows efficient, approximate sampling from dense multi-label crfs using random perturbations. an analytic error analysis revealed the main source of approximation error and demonstrated its bounded nature. spatial uncertainty maps can be generated from the model, enabling visualization of uncertainty in image segmentation. the method was tested on synthetic and clinical magnetic resonance imaging data, focusing on glioblastoma tumor core segmentation. high uncertainty areas were found to correlate with incorrectly segmented regions. the potential of uncertainty maps in refining imaging biomarkers for extent of resection and residual tumor volume was also explored.

when daylight softens and evening approaches, observe the wildlife: may-flies, owls, hares, cuckoos, curlews, quails, swallows, and swifts. ponder their mysterious migrations and survival during harsh seasons, guided by nature's divine instinct. settle on a bench as darkness falls, listening to insects and creatures of the night - bats, crickets, dorr-beetles, churn-owls, and woodlarks. embrace the melancholic beauty of rural sensations: sounds of sheep-bells, cattle, fresh hay, and smoking chimneys. as night descends and dew falls, the glow-worm's light signals the arrival of evening, reminiscent of lovers' ancient rendezvous.

true, i appreciate that bodily organs remain within the body and external things stay outside. i'm relieved that lungs are contained in the chest, preventing inconvenience and mess. imagine shaking hands and revealing internal organs, or standing in a crowded subway with exposed viscera. consider a knitting grandmother whose veins suddenly emerge, creating a disturbing scene for an unsuspecting viewer. what if voices and mouths functioned differently, blurring the boundaries between self and other?

wimsey takes a job at pym's publicity to investigate victor dean's mysterious death. dean's unfinished letter suggests a potential scandal. using the pseudonym "death bredon," wimsey works at the firm, becoming a skilled copywriter while investigating the staff. he learns about dean's social circle, including dian de momerie's cocaine-using group and major milligan, their suspected drug supplier.

wimsey discovers the cocaine ring's distribution method involves using the first letter of a weekly advertisement to signal the meeting location. tallboy, a senior copywriter, provides this information to the ring. a series of events, including a cricket match and puncheon's encounter with cocaine, help wimsey unravel the mystery.

the police arrest wimsey as "bredon" for dian de momerie's murder, but the drug ring roundup proceeds. later, tallboy confesses to dean's murder, explaining he killed dean to prevent blackmail. he shot dean with ginger joe's catapult to make it look like an accident.

facing potential suicide, tallboy receives an alternative from wimsey: walk home without looking back, knowing the gang's assassins are waiting.

the paper introduces a kernelized image segmentation method for noisy images using the susan concept and spatial constraints through circular colour map-induced weights. fuzzy damping coefficients are derived for each nucleus based on weighted susan area values, with weights inversely proportional to horizontal and vertical moves from the center pixel. these weights modulate nucleus contributions in the kernel framework. an edge quality metric is proposed using fuzzy decision-based edge candidate selection and edge blurriness computation. the edge quality factor (eqf) addresses existing algorithms' limitations in preserving edge information and structural details. qualitative and quantitative analyses are conducted using state-of-the-art algorithms and images with various noise types, including speckle noise in sar images and rician noise in magnetic resonance images.

deep learning medical image segmentation algorithms currently require extensive expert annotation. these data-intensive models perform poorly with limited labeled data. the paper introduces a data-efficient learning framework using generative adversarial networks, enabling neural networks to perform better than fully supervised models with minimal annotations. the proposed method extends previous work by adding an unsupervised adversarial loss and structured prediction architecture. it is the first adversarial framework-based structured prediction model for medical image segmentation, demonstrated through blood vessel segmentation in retinal fundus images. experiments with extremely low annotation budgets (0.8 - 1.6%) on drive and stare datasets show the method outperforms previous and benchmark fully supervised models. systematic ablation studies also provide insights into training gan-based semi-supervised algorithms with encoder-decoder network architectures.

the paper develops an integrated system for jointly parsing clothing images annotated with tags into semantic configurations. it proposes a two-phase data-driven framework. the first phase, image co-segmentation, uses exemplar-svm to iteratively extract and refine consistent regions across images. the second phase, region co-labeling, constructs a multi-image graphical model with segmented regions as vertices, incorporating clothing configuration contexts. the joint label assignment is solved using graph cuts algorithm. the method is evaluated on the fashionista and a newly constructed ccp dataset, achieving high segmentation accuracy and recognition rates compared to existing methods.

twenty-eight unclothed young women bathe near a woodland lake's edge, embodying youthful beauty and unselfconscious vitality. a wealthy thirty-year-old man observes them from a distance, hidden behind curtains, contemplating their collective allure while experiencing a detached, voyeuristic enchantment. his wealthy perspective creates a form of perceptual limitation, rendering the women simultaneously accessible and unreachable, with their nakedness representing a complex interplay of desire, beauty, and existential observation.

you never heard the story about pardon, the remarkable racehorse from the "never" region? he was a strong, determined horse bred from the mameluke breed, who consistently won races against the odds. despite being deliberately sabotaged by being overfed before a crucial race, pardon managed to overcome the challenge, winning multiple heats and ultimately triumphing in the president's cup. the narrator, who seems deeply connected to the horse, expresses hope that pardon will continue racing even in the afterlife, among angels and other celestial beings.

weakly-supervised instance segmentation, aiming to reduce labor and time for pixel mask annotation, has gained increasing research interest. the typical approach first uses conventional segmentation methods to generate initial masks, then iteratively trains a segmentation network. however, these initial masks often include a significant number of invalid masks, particularly for small object instances. directly using such masks for training can harm model performance. to tackle this issue, we introduce a hybrid network with a primary segmentation network for handling samples with valid masks and a complementary branch designed to process small and dim objects lacking valid masks. experimental results demonstrate our method's superior performance on both small and large object instances, surpassing existing state-of-the-art techniques.

light trapping in nanowires (nws) presents a method to reduce material usage and improve photovoltaic performance. current nw photonic devices have an absorption efficiency around 1, with limited spectral width. experimental findings reveal that nws with higher refractive indices can significantly enhance absorption efficiency, demonstrated by up to 350% external quantum efficiency in lead sulfide nw resonators, which is three times higher than silicon nws. broadband absorption is achieved in tapered nws by absorbing light at different diameter segments, similar to tandem solar cells. the single nw schottky junction solar cells leverage optical resonance, near bandgap open circuit voltage, and long minority carrier diffusion length, achieving power conversion efficiency comparable to single silicon nw coaxial p-n junction cells, but with simpler fabrication.

a long-standing concept of living with duplicity
where people skillfully maintain false appearances
pretending sympathy while harboring hidden motives
presenting contrasting external and internal realities
various professionals exploit this dual narrative
politicians, doctors, teachers, and traders manipulate perceptions
masking true intentions behind noble-seeming facades
ultimately exploiting systems and people's trust
revealing a complex social landscape of deception
where self-interest trumps genuine service

the narrative begins with an excerpt from the book of dreams, containing howard alan treesong's childhood writings about seven paladins in a fantasy world. gersen learns from an ipcc contact that treesong, previously known as the "lord of the overmen," has been quiet. gersen creates a magazine contest using a mysterious photograph to identify treesong, employing alice wroke to process entries. the photograph reveals treesong's connection to the institute, where he murdered high-ranking fellows to potentially become the triune. gersen tracks treesong to his hometown, obtaining his childhood "book of dreams" and learning about his past. at a school reunion, gersen confronts treesong, disrupting his revenge plot. following leads, gersen ultimately locates treesong on bethune preserve, where the cleadhoes have marmelized his legs. treesong acknowledges his defeat and, after an enigmatic conversation with his imaginary paladins, seemingly drowns himself in a pond. gersen, having completed his revenge, feels unexpectedly lost without his enemies.

partial differential equation-based active contour models have been effective in image segmentation, but their geometric formulation on diverse geometric graphs remains unexplored. this research introduces geometric approximations of gradient and curvature for the geodesic active contour model. the gradient approximation's convergence in probability is demonstrated, with an asymptotic error bound derived for random geometric graphs. two curvature approximation methods are proposed, both proving probabilistic convergence on random geometric graphs. neighborhood-based graph filtering is suggested to enhance approximation accuracy, along with two gaussian smoothing variants that include normalization to address graph non-uniformities. the proposed graph-based active contour framework is validated through segmentation of standard images and geographical data on arbitrary graphs.
